name: Arcade Party Pak
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: Tested on SCPH-75001: Partially incompatible. 720 degrees loads but flickers constantly through all game screens: Unplayable, unless one wants to play through the constant flicker. Klax loads and plays without any obvious issues: Playable. Rampage loads and plays without any obvious issues: Playable, multi-tap not tested. Smash TV is occasionally stuck in a firing direction until X, O, Square or Triangle is pressed and some short duration green enemy jitter occasionally occurs at the very start of the first screen: Playable, dual analog also supported. Super Sprint gets stuck on a flickering blue screen when loading: Unplayable. Toobin' has minor flickering during load transition screens but game screens show no obvious issues: Playable.

name: Arcade's Greatest Hits/Atari 2
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS

name: Fighter Maker
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS

name: Final Fantasy Anthology
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: Occasional graphic glitches on save/load screen in Final Fantasy V, no issues in Final Fantasy VI; this glitch was fixed in the green label Greatest Hits version released in 2004

name: Monkey Hero
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS

name: Tomba!
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: The intro sequence must play for the game to start up properly.

name: X2
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: Glitches in menus

name: Mortal Kombat Trilogy
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: The game will only freeze on a PlayStation 2 if the 'BUY IN SCREEN' option is set to 'OFF', and if the continue timer runs out. The game also only supports original PlayStation controllers.

name: Namco Museum Encore
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: While not incompatible, two of the games included, Rolling Thunder and Wonder Momo, lag when played on a PlayStation 2 console.

name: The X-Files Game
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: Graphical glitches with cursor.

name: Gran Turismo 2 Demo
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: Graphical glitches with Gran Turismo mode menus.

name: Metal Gear Solid
details: APPLIES TO ALL PS2 VARIANTS: Game will freeze during credit sequence if PS2 smoothing is enabled in BIOS
